args: Prince! Prince! You have to let me\nhelp out around the castle!
Gya! ...Er, I mean, what are you\ntalking about, Pia?
See, 'cause I wanna thank you and all\nthe other nice people in the Halidom!
Oh, folks are always coming to listen to\nmy singing rehearsals and giving me tasty\ntreats and stuff like that. Y'know?
So I wanted to do something nice\nfor everyone in return!
Well, that's a lovely thoughtâ€”and I know\nCleo and the others would appreciate it.
But are you sure you want to rush off and\nstart cleaning right now? You'll get your\nchoir uniform all dirty if you do.
Aw, you don't have to worry about that.\nI brought just the thing...
It's my clothes from when we infiltrated\nEmile's manor! These can get dirty as a\npig in a...wherever pigs live.
Er, but Althemia put a lot of work into\nmaking them, so I don't want them to\nget TOO dirty. That would be sad.
Anyway, time to go! I'll start by helping\nto clean the castle...
Oh maaaan! Every single room in this\nplace is already clean enough to eat\noatmeal off the floor!
Ah, young Pia. How fare you?
Fine, I guess. But I really wanted to\nhelp everyone out with the cleaning...
Yet I have just finished cleaning all the\nrooms, as you can clearly see.
The roof is all that remains to be done,\nand I fear it may be too dangerous for you.
It's okay! I'll just go look for something\nelse I can help with.
Yeah! What do you need? Sous chef?\nLine cook? Food chopper-upper?
Actually, I'm about to make tempura,\nand I don't really want you mucking\nabout while hot oil is in play. Sorry.
How about you, Valerio? Do you have\nanything you need help with?

I am currently preparing a dish that
uses cooking sake. It may be difficult
for a child to assist, as the smell can be
quite overpowering.
Okay, but how about a chop salad?\nI practiced it a lot with my mom, and I\ncan cut those carrots like the wind!
Got those veggies diced up just like\nyou wanted, chef.
As you can see, I already assigned that\nparticular task to Vice.
(Makes sense, I guess. Vice is really good\nwith knives, so he probably slices and\ndices faster than anybody.)
That sounded like an explosion.\nAre we under attack?
Don't worry. It's just Sinoa again.
She made something ELSE blow up?\nThat girl's room must be a total disaster.
Well, this is a fine messâ€”even the\nhallway is filled with debris.
I appreciate your consideration, but we\nneed to have an adult handle this.
There's shattered glass everywhere,\nand I could never forgive myself if you\ncut yourself on any of it.
But if you do it alone, you're gonna\nbe cleaning this place for hours...
It's all right. I have Melody to help me,\nso we should be able to...
MELODY! HOW ARE YOU MAKING THIS\nROOM EVEN MESSIER THAN BEFORE?!
Honestly... Are you hurt? Let me see.
(I guess it would just make even more\nwork for Cleo if I tried to help and ended\nup covered in my own blood.)
So that's why you're moping\nin the courtyard?
If that's not moping, I don't know what is.\nWell, how about helping out with\nsomething that YOU can do?
But whatever I can do, somebody else is\nalready doing!
And they're all better at it!
So like I said, you need to find something\nyou can do BECAUSE of who you are.
If you find something that no one but you\ncan do, it means no one can beat you to\nthe punch and do it first.
For example, no one else sings how I sing,\nand it's the same for you.
All I know for certain is that being all sad\nand mopey won't do anyone any good.
Anyway, I have to go to rehearsal now.\nGood luck with everything.
So I need to find something only I can\ndo, huh? But what would that be...?
Oh, but this is horrid! Just horrid!
Oh dear! I'm going to be late!
Why, the royal tea party, of course!
Oh no! He's stuck in a hole!
Hold on, friend! I will save you!
Huh? Where's that voice coming from...?
Do you see anyone else here, hmm?
Mr. Mouse, but if you don't hurry,\nI'm going to be late!
Don't worry, I got this!\nPia, help me push!
Okay! On three, right? One, two, THREE!
We did it! He's free! Wait, but... Uh oh.
(I pushed Mariti so hard I lost my balance\nand now I'm gonna fall in the hole!)
